participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, loves trying new things and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I am traveling to Barbados next month. I like fitness. I am a travel agent. My parents own a business that I am now running.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys music and spending time outdoors, especially with pets.
participant_2.background: My grandma is from Denmark. My dog's name is Toto. My favorite band used to be Toto. My car is green and smells weird.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and spend time with my dog.
I like to go to concerts too! Who's your favorite band?
My favorite band used to be Toto, but they broke up a few years ago.
Oh, that's too bad. What kind of music do you like to listen to now?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
I like indie rock too! Do you have any favorite bands?
I like The National, The Shins, and The XX.
Oh, I love those bands! We should go to a concert together sometime.
Great! I'll let you know when I find a good show.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and kayaking. I also like to play video games and read books.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Cool! We should hang out sometime.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
